newsitem.title: TAIWAN: Taiwan BSPA to tender for 54,000 tonnes soybeans.
newsitem.headline: Taiwan BSPA to tender for 54,000 tonnes soybeans.

text.p: The Kaohsiung division of Taiwan's Breakfast Soybean Procurement Association will tender on Tuesday for a 54,000-tonne shipment of Brazilian or Argentine soybeans, traders said on Monday.

Traders said the tender, if completed with a purchase, could have the effect of luring other Taiwan soy buyers into the market, particularly the unaffiliated Taichung division of the Breakfast Soybean Procurement Association.
The Kaohsiung division comprises Great Wall Enterprise, Ttet Union, President Enterprise and Tai Hwa Oil.
Details for the tender are as follows:
